thread.title: PBOC Says it Will Give Ample Liquidity to Aid China Stock Market
thread.title_full: PBOC Says it Will Give Ample Liquidity to Aid China Stock Market - Bloomberg Business

author: Bloomberg.com
title: PBOC Says it Will Give Ample Liquidity to Aid China Stock Market
text:
China’s central bank will provide “ample liquidity” to the nation’s stock market, it said in a statement on its website Wednesday.
The People’s Bank of China said it will provide liquidity to the China Securities Finance Corp. and will prevent “systemic” risks.
The Shanghai Composite Index opened today by falling as much as 8.2 percent.
